Desc.entry: A city-wide communications campaign that is a partnership between Sheffield City Council and Sheffield First for Environment Partnership. Works so that SheffieldÂ’s private sector, public sector and voluntary, community and faith sectors can join forces to tackle the huge task needed to bring about the dramatic cuts in carbon emissions. Top priority for the campaign is to help sheffielders to take action to reduce their carbon footprint. Provides relevant local information to support people in taking action and getting involved in what is happening in local areas and across the city.
